meanings.definition: The beliefs, practices, or rituals of a secret or exclusive group.
meanings.sent1: The cabalisms of the ancient society were shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent2: She delved into the cabalisms of the secretive organization.
meanings.sent3: The cabalisms of the club made it seem like a hidden treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: His understanding of the cabalisms was like deciphering a cryptic code.
meanings.sent5: The cabalisms whispered among the members were like ancient whispers in a cave.

meanings.definition: Mysterious or esoteric knowledge or teachings.
meanings.sent1: The professor shared his cabalisms with a select few students.
meanings.sent2: She was intrigued by the cabalisms of the occult practices.
meanings.sent3: The cabalisms of the magician seemed to defy logic.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held a glint of cabalisms, hinting at hidden truths.
meanings.sent5: The book contained ancient cabalisms that unlocked new perspectives.
